                & & \K_1^{\sigma_1^4} \simeq \K_{f_1} \ar[ddl, "2", dash] \\
                \K_1^{\sigma_1^3} \ar[dd, "2", dash] \ar[dddr, "3", dash]&& \\

                & \K_1^{\sigma_1} \ar[d, "2", dash] & \\
                & \Q &
